channel.title: Voice audio translation
channel.description:
Hi guys,
i need some help to translate english voice to italian voice.
I have extrack italian file from pak file but folder structure and name of files is similar but different and the only one solution now is listen all english files and all italian and compare it for find the match....too long and unthinkable.
So i ask to you if there'is a map file (maybe) of old half life structure wav files compare to the new black mesa for find the match easyly.
Thank you!

item.title: Voice audio translation
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I think the big problem here is that there are entirely new audio clips, such as the addition of Kleiner and Eli Vance speaking before the resonance cascade is very different from the original Half Life and even did not exist in the old Half-Life (such as the conversation of the scientists berating another scientist for unoriginal research).

Read full topic

item.title: Voice audio translation
item.dc:creator: zambu87
item.description:
Hi guys,

i need some help to translate english voice to italian voice.

I have extrack italian file from pak file but folder structure and name of files is similar but different and the only one solution now is listen all english files and all italian and compare it for find the match…too long and unthinkable.

So i ask to you if there’is a map file (maybe) of old half life structure wav files compare to the new black mesa for find the match easyly.
